text:
Drinking Rainwater

[Verse 1]
Scratching skies. Scratching skies.
Matches on eyes. I’m tragic. Feists 
Keep barking and biting in the bloody park. A lightning
Hits loonies like Rooney. Fighting
Is frigging hard. Listen to Linkin Park.
Please praise heavy drinkers. Call us heady thinkers.
I don’t give a f…ck about Mariah Carey’s wrinkles.
Put on jelly blinkers and shake you a…ss, lady!
Kindle my gas. Crazy like Teddy. Bury-bury-bury
My sorrow under the cherry-cherry-cherry.
Drinking rainwater helps me play. Slaughter
Demons who slay daughters. The sky is grey. Otters
Wanna tear me apart. They scare me. Start
Blaring. Fart to kick ‘em away. Keep drinking. Okay.
Sick of thinking. Play my guitar and clean my star.
Sun keeps sinking. Rays fade blinking. Decay
Is my favorite game. 

[Chorus]
Drinking rainwater,
I’m wetting my soul.
It’s my game. Copper,
F…ck off and go home!

[Verse 2]
Water-water-water
Is all I need now.
Slaughter-slaughter-slaughter
Demons who bliss out.
Horror-horror-horror
Is out now.
Hanky-panky is my hobby. Every body-body
Is mine. My landmine astonishes a bobby
When he blows up like a kite.
Enemies fly-fly. My reveries die-die
When C-4 is stolen by-by dangerous passers-by.
It’s f…cking difficult to become spiffy. Build
Castles of sadness. Love madness. I’m not a nifty skig.
Gonna rot in a jiffy. K…lled by blues. 
When I lose my muse, I become difficult.
Neighbors keep sniffing sh…t. I keep fishing. Dig
Graves for my neighbors and haters.
Happy Thanksgiving. Big turkeys quit smoking cold turkey.
My demons get old. Sturdy goons decompose in murky rooms.
I got dirty. Tombs scare my C foes. Slap B Knowles. 
Dreaming sucks. I need more bucks to buy tickets
To New York where I can walk avenues and talk
To chatty boobs. Gonna go batty. News
Irritates me like happy dudes who live in Manhattan. Lose
The game to regain envy. Clouds are heavy. Play
My rock ballads. My blood shocks h…rlots.
Slice the dog and mock marmots. I bop-bop muppets.

[Chorus]
Drinking rainwater,
I’m wetting my soul.
It’s my game. Copper,
F…ck off and go home!

[Verse 3]
Tired of rain. I feel the fire pain. I buy it. Chase
Monsters who eat mobsters. Blaze and make
Rays shine when landmines help you enjoy a gaze
Of death. Meth in my headphones. 
Sniping is my bread, folks. My bad for the dead foes.
I bet-bet ghosts wanna punish me for their wet clothes.
Smoke a cigarette. Roads make me sick. Go over big?
No! I wanna hijack a jet known as Eagle. 
People envy my skills and talents. Eat the gills and talons.
I pay my bills and malice is my die-hard crony.
All rap stars know me because I play cards, homie.
Clubs in clubs. I win slowly and go home. Now you know me.
Sky is angry. I’m still hungry like a mouse in an empty pantry.
Hunger-hunger always whacks G. 
Clouds turn grey when I wanna burn hay.
I have to learn how to play cards with my fate.
It shares rain. I drink it and forget about the nightmare pain. 
I’m gonna spare hares today. Rain in my stomach.
It’s nourishing like a dunnock. Rain alleviates my pain.

[Chorus]
Drinking rainwater,
I’m wetting my soul.
It’s my game. Copper,
F…ck off and go home!

[Outro]
Water in my stomach.
I’m gonna vomit….
Water in my stomach.
I’m gonna vomit….
Water in my stomach.
I’m gonna vomit….

© Norfum 2023.

text: El 18 de Agosto de este año (2023) después de 18 días sufriendo por una terrible enfermedad, mi mascota "Milan" me dejó. Ese mismo día estaba lejos por mi trabajo... quería llegar antes que lo pusieran a dormir, pero el destino no me lo permitió, casualmente ese día hubo mucho trafico, mucha lluvia y llegue cuando ya el veterinario lo había puesto a dormir 😢 durante ese largo camino de  más de 3 horas para llegar a mi casa, esa canción iba sonando y por eso, esta canción es especial; me vinen a la mente toda la vida que pase con él. ALGUNOS TAL VEZ DIGAN, es solo un perro... pero NO, era el ser más especial de mi vida. EN MEMORIA DE MILAN 🕊 espero encontrarme en alguna otra vida o dimensión con vos, te extraño cada día de mi vida ❤
author: Michi P.

my mom was deported last year in July 2022 to Guatemala and having her far from her family is hard for her she has many health issues but this song gives her comfort and breaks her down each time. Every time I miss my mom I just listen to this song it's so beautiful and makes me feel closer to my mom. 
We live in Florida and my mom is currently in Guatemala she did nothing wrong my dad just parked my car in a pick-only spot at Port of Maimi not thinking of course they saw my mom in the passenger side and just harassed her. My mom has a clean record and has never done anything wrong and they treated my mother as if she was a criminal. Every night I pray my mom will be back home with us and we will get a response soon for her to come back home soon<3

text: The pandemic has had a terrible impact on the economies of all countries, the reasons for it have not been fully clarified. In order for the economy to survive, some "advanced" economists go to various tricks and competition becomes fierce until the appearance of an animal grin. When in Europe, they wanted to save on NATO security services, they said that we do not have enemies on this continent and we do not need your security and very expensive services. To which some people with power said, you don't have enemies, we will create them. And they pitted fraternal peoples against each other, paying drug addicts for atrocities against people, provoked a conflict. Now the enemy has appeared, it remains only to paint him in terrible colors with false information. Now there is not just an enemy, but a monster armed to the teeth, which can take over the whole world, and which he, this world, does not need, because he has not yet mastered his vast territory. Is it possible to call it an economy, undermining the supply of fuel to dependent countries in order to then sell their fuel at an inflated price and drive the conflicting country into debt, supplying it with outdated weapons, not knowing how to write it off and throw it into scrap metal. And then, at the expense of this country, upgrade your arsenal. For some would-be economists, far from Microsoft and Apple, war is very profitable. And people's lives are just one of the renewable resources and a bargaining chip for such a profitable situation. This is very far from the world of Adam Smith's money, and even more so from democracy. This is not green technology and not the 21st century, this is the deep Middle Ages and where such dinosaurs come from, we can only guess, maybe it's dementia☮️✌️🌏

text:
(Cry in stony ears)


May the dish of forgiveness, O pure love, not be accommodated
To bake my sin
O my confused steps, the course of life is full of tiring pitfalls
Did you lend me guidance, O pure love?
I am blind at heart
Please help me to lean on your stick
I promise to carry all my misery
alone
I may reach the shores of happiness one day
I miss the faces that hid behind the curtain of oblivion.
Like the ports that long for the sails returning from an old travel
Does the lamp light up in the morning?
The night is blind without lanterns
They are the only ones who left their hopes hanging in the sun, they are the only ones who know that fate does not respond to the wailing of the wounded
When the words of the poems fall into the warm chapter of melodies
Everything is silent, no ears receive my sad voice
But I'm still screaming like the only tweet though
absence
Despite the remorse
Despite desertion
I am confused and chained in waiting prisons
I await the coming of the god of poetry
Until he frees me from the eternal prisons of nostalgia

text:
Cette chanson est très révélatrice des facettes de la solitude aussi bien chez l'homme que chez la femme, lorsque l'on porte tout sur notre dos, comme s'il on était perdu au fond d'un désert. Il fut un temps où j'étais au fond du trou. 
J'avais besoin de quelqu'un, n'importe qui, une seule personne, qui puisse m'aider à me relever. Je sentis l'air autour de moi, le bruit des vagues, comme si j'étais effondré sur le sable, en regardant la mer et en écoutant le bruit des mouettes et des vagues...
Lors de ces moments-là, je n'entendais que ça et rien d'autre, je n'arrêtais pas à m'arrêter de pleurer, j'étais à bout, fatigué jusqu'à l'épuisement. Accablé par la douleur et la chaleur, j'étais misérable, pitoyable, je me mettais à genoux et je priais devant le soleil. 
Cette mélancolie, cette détresse se révèle à travers cette chanson. C'est là où tu n'espères plus rien parce que tu as tout donné, et que tu as tout perdu. Il ne te reste plus rien, tu n'as plus aucun espoir, tu sens que tu vas mourir bientôt. Tu ne peux pas retenir tes larmes. Tu ressens comme une boule dans ta gorge, impossible à retirer. 
Et puis, tu te lèves. Tu commence à lever les bras, à sentir le vent dans tes cheveux, à pleurer, et tu prie. Tu supplie Dieu que quelqu'un vienne à ton aide  C'est une demande si forte que tu n'en restes sans voix. , mais tu sais que personne ne sera là pour toi, que tu étais destiné à mourir. Je suis détruit, je n'ai plus de vie, j'ai plus d'espoir, j'ai plus rien. J'ai plus d'espoir, j'ai plus rien. Il fut véritablement un temps où je n'avais qu'une envie, c'était de me foutre en l'air, pour rejoindre le soleil. 
Tu n'accepte plus le silence, tu ne ressens plus rien, tout est un poids, et rien ne pourra te faire partir d'ici. Tu resteras coincé ici à jamais. Tu n'as jamais aussi pensé profondément. 
Je me sens minable, déprimé, éreinté, j'ai l'impression que je n'ai plus envie de pleurer, de crier, plus envie de vomir, enfin j'ai envie de rien faire. Alors, d'une saine simplicité, j'ai juste demandé en deux mots : "Aide-moi". C'était tout ce que je pouvais dire, je n'avais que ces deux mots à la bouche. J'aurais pu dire, "qu'est-ce que j'ai fait pour mériter ça" ? "Je n'en vaux pas la peine", "Sauve-moi, je n'en peux plus", mais je suis arrivé à un stade où tout paraissait insurmontable, tout était impossible. 
En fait, je n'avais même plus envie d'aller mieux. J'étais telle une baleine qui gisait sur le sol, plus rien ne me retenait, je n'avais plus aucune force... Mais il reste cette flamme, cette étincelle qui reste toujours avec toi, cette lueur d'espoir qui t'accompagnera toujours, et qui te permettra de dire ces deux mots, que tu n'arrivais jamais à prononcer. Oh ciel, j'ai tout demandé, je ne mérite rien, je ne sais rien, je ne suis rien, je ne mérite que de mourir. C'est un supplice, je n'arrivais plus à respirer ! 
Oh mon dieu, toi, ne fais pas comme moi, je ne suis guère un exemple. Si tu vas mal, ne parle pas, ne t'enfonce pas dans le sable.

text: My deaf student (with various health challenges since age 2) and myself were practicing this song to sing and sign hopefully for her HS graduation June 6.  She was in and out of hospital 5 months prior to grad so we never finished. She never physically made it to graduation but received her diploma while in ICU. She passed away June 20..sigh. in school you cld see she had a couple of challenges but no one could reckon all her complications bcuz she had soo much spirit and laughter. We made eachother laugh on the worse days we didn't feel it.  Her funeral was scheduled the same day I had assignment to interpret the Diana Ross concert in VA.  I didn't know how I was gonna make it but someone was praying.  I dedicated my work to Grandma Kiki..lol. Grandma MJ will always remember you.  #GoneTooSoon #SheDidntKnowItWasHerTime. #SepsisSucks
